maqras.text: 100|9|dau che  neah  tae ke mindoeng te ryytha  nowpel del avei  nowknong phnaur  trauv ke b po  ch nh mk( daembi chomnoumchomreah)
100|10|ning avei del mean nowknong chetd( robsa mnoussa) nung trauv ke  leatatradeang aoy kheunh yeang chbasa noh
100|11|pitabrakd nasa  now thngai noh mcheasa robsa puokke doeng bamphot  champoh ruengreav robsa puokke .
101|1|a l k ri aah .
101|2|tae a l k ri aah chea avei
101|3|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  a l k ri aah chea avei noh
101|4|kuchea thngai del mnoussa lok brieb dauchchea hvaung satv meambaw  del haer brasechabrasaeach .
101|5|haey phnom teanglay brieb dauchchea romosatv del trauv ke thveu aoy baeng .
101|6|haey rie anaknea del phnekachonhching robsa ke thngon( khang ampeula) noh .
101|7|ku ke nung sthet knong karorsanow brakabdaoy kdei penh chetd(now  knong thansuokr) .
101|8|haey chamnek e anaknea del phnekachonhching robsa ke sral ( khang ampeula) noh .
101|9|tilomnow robsa ke ku nork ha vi yah( rondawnork da chrow) .
101|10|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha vea chea avei noh
101|11|vea kuchea phleung nork da sen kdaw .
102|1|pheap kraeutakratm nung pheap meanotropy sa mb tde  ning kaunchaw  cheachraen ban thveu aoy puok anak phe  l ch khluon( pi karkorp brate b tde champoh  a l laoh) .
102|2|rhaut puok anak chaul tow knong phnaur( rhaut anak slab) .
102|3|te.  puok anak kngte nung doeng cheaminkhan  .
102|4|te.  banteabmk puok anak kngte nung doeng .
102|5|te.  brasenbae puok anakdoeng( pi lotthophl nei kar phe  l ch khluon robsa  puok anak) daoy kar doeng yeang chbasaleasa noh( puok anak pitchea min thveu  dauchnaoh laey) .
102|6|chea karpit nasa  puok anak nung kheunh nork cheu hi m cheaminkhan .
102|7|banteabmk  puok anak pitchea nung kheunh vea yeang chbasa nung phnek .
102|8|kraoyomk  puok anak nung trauv ke suor now thngai noh ampi nie k meat  del trong ban bratan aoy puok anak .
103|1|a l laoh sbath nung pelvelea .
103|2|pitabrakd nasa  mnoussa lok ku sthet ko  n ng pheap khatabng .
103|3|leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue  ning ban sang ampeu  la troemotrauv  ning ban phdephdam knea aoy brakean khchab nouv karpit  ning ban phdephdam  knea aoy meankar atthmot bonnaoh .
104|1|vineasa a nd reay haey champoh anak niyeay muolobangkeach ning  anak niyeay daem ke .
104|2|kuchea anak del ban bramoul tropy sa mb tde ning reab chamnuon robsa vea
104|3|daoy ke kitthea  tropy sa mb tde robsa ke pitchea thveu aoy ke now  kngvongsa chea rieng haut .
104|4|min dauchnaoh te.  karpit ke nung trauv ke baoh banhchoul tow knong hou t  mah .
104|5|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha hou t  mah chea avei noh
104|6|kuchea phleung robsa a l laoh del ban bangkeat touk(nowknong  nork)
104|7|del vea chabcheh real dl behdaung .
104|8|pitabrakd nasa  nork noh trauv ban bet chit  daembi komaoy  puokke chenh .
104|9|trauv ban changophcheab nung sasar da veng .
105|1|tae anak( mou ham meat) min bankheunh te ryytha  mcheasa robsa anak  ban thveu towleu krom tp damri yeang dauch me  d ch
105|2|tae trong minban thveu aoy ubayokl akrak robsa puokke v nge  vng ( breachy) te ryy
105|3|haey trong ban banhchoun baksaei teang hvaung  tow brayoutth tatl  nung puokke .
105|4|puokvea tomleak towleu puokke daoy dom thm sai ch chchi l( del mk pi  phleung nork) .
105|5|ruochamk trong ban thveu aoy puokke brieb dauchchea sloekchheu del trauv  dangkouv sai .
106|1|chea tomleab nei kolosampnth kou r sh .
106|2|tomleab robsa puokke ku kar thveudamnaer now rdauvornga r( daembi thveu  chomnuonh now bratesa ye men)  ning( now bratesa sha m) now rdauvokdaw .
106|3|dau che  neah  chaur aoy puokke korp sakkar champoh mcheasa krobkrong  kak hpeah nih choh .
106|4|ku trong chea anak del ban phdal chamneiahar dl puokke daembi  bambat nouv kar se  r k khlean  ning phdal sa ndi pheap dl puokke aoy chiesa phot  pi karphyokhlach .
107|1|tae anak( mou ham meat) bankheunh bokkol del bdeseth nung thngai  chomnoumchomreah der ryyte
107|2|noh haey kuchea bokkol del baohbng kaunkamprea .
107|3|haey min ch mrou nh knea aoy phdal chamneiahar dl anak kreikr .
107|4|dau che  neah  pheap vineasa a nd reay ku samreab puok del sa la t
107|5|del puokke prongeuy k ndeu y champoh kar sa la t robsa puokke .
107|6|puokke kuchea puok del sang ampeula daembi chng bangheanh aoy ke  kheunh tebonnaoh .
107|7|haey puokke min aoy tropy ke khchei laey  saumbite b ndi ch b nduoch  kadaoy .
108|1|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban bratan aoy anak( mou ham meat)  nouv a l ka v sae r( t ne  l muoy nowknong thansuokr) .
108|2|dau che  neah  chaur anak sa lat  ning saamleh satv daembi mcheasa robsa anak  choh .
108|3|pitabrakd nasa  anak del saabkhpaem anak( mou ham meat) ke  nung trauv katphdach pi phl la( teang nowknong lokey  ning barlok) .
109|1|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  ao puok del brachheang
109|2|khnhom min korp sakkar champoh avei del puok anak korp sakkar  noh laey .
109|3|haey puok anak ka minmen chea anak korp sakkar champoh avei del  khnhom korp sakkar noh der .
109|4|haey khnhom minmen chea anak del korp sakkar champoh avei del  puok anak ban korp sakkar noh laey .
109|5|haey puok anak ka minmen chea anak korp sakkar champoh avei del khnhom korp sakkar noh der .
109|6|samreab puok anak ku sasanea robsa puok anak  haey samreab khnhom  ku sasanea robsakhnhom .
110|1|nowpel del chomnuoy robsa a l laoh  ning chychomneah ban mk  dl( kar romdaoh tikrong mea kkah) .
110|2|pelnoh anak nung kheunh mnoussaamna chaul sasanea robsa  a l laoh teang krom  .
110|3|dau che  neah  chaur anak leukatamkeung daoy kar sarsaer tow champoh  mcheasa robsa anak  ning som aphytosa pi trong .  pitabrakd nasa trong  kuchea anak del ttuol yk kar som aphytosa bamphot .
111|1|dai teangpir( tongveu) robsa a pou la hab ban vineasa a nd reay  haey ke ka vineasa a nd reay .
111|2|tropy sa mb tde robsa ke ning avei  delke ban sang kanlongomk  minban phdal phalobrayoch dl ke laey .
111|3|ke nung chaul tow knong nork del mean andataphleung da santho  santhow .
111|4|haey phriyea robsa ke del chea anak yk banlea( reay leu phlauv  daembi thveubeab mou ham meat) ka dauchnaoh der .
111|5|now nung k robsa neang mean khsae chr vea k phleung .
112|1|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  a l laoh kuchea mcheasa temuoyokt .
112|2|a l laoh  kuchea anak del trauv ke pungpeak  .
112|3|trong minban brasaut botr laey  haey trong ka min trauv ke  brasaut der  .
112|4|haey kmean norna mneak briebabradauch nung trong laey .
113|1|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  khnhom som pi mcheasa krobkrong pel  tiebaphlu aoy banhchiesa  .
113|2|ampi brakear akrak teanglay del trong ban bangkeut mk .
113|3|ning ampi brakear akrak nei peloyb nowpel del pheap  ngngut ban mokadl .
113|4|ning ampi brakear akrak robsa puok sdrei m nd akm del sautr  phlom m nd akm tow knong khsaechamnng .
113|5|haeyning ampi brakear akrak robsa anak chranen chhneanisa  nowpel delke chranen chhneanisa .
114|1|chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  khnhom som pi mcheasa nei mnoussa lok
114|2|del chea se  d ch krobkrong mnoussa lok
114|3|chea mcheasa nei mnoussa lok
114|4|aoy banhchiesa pi brakear akrak nei kar nhouhnhng robsa  puok shai t n
114|5|del vea nhouhnhng nowknong chetd mnoussa lok .
114|6|( shai t n noh) mk ampi chin  ning mnoussa lok .
